setTargetSize

public float setTargetSize(java.awt.Dimension newSize)
Description copied from interface: IDotplot
Tells the dotplot to scale images to the given size. File exports are not affected.

Specified by:
setTargetSize in interface IDotplot
Parameters:
newSize - a Dimension object specifying the target size value
Returns:
the new scale factor

getImage

public java.lang.Object getImage(java.lang.Class imageClass)
Description copied from interface: IDotplot
Lets the Dotplot return a representation of the internal image, using the desired class type. If the given class type does not exist, null will be returned.

Specified by:
getImage in interface IDotplot
Parameters:
imageClass - one of the supported class types
Returns:
the image, or null if problems occured
See Also:
IDotplot.IMG_SWT_IMAGEDATA, IDotplot.IMG_JAI_PLANARIMAGE
